title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.5 - Mooring facilities, condition for use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.5 - Mooring facilities, condition for use

State Regulations

The mooring of watercraft at a terminal shall constiute
an agreement by the owner, operator and master to conform to the regulations
and to all orders and instructions of the Port Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1242.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
